name: Medkit, small
description: Can be used to heal small wounds and gain a little vitality.

name: Medkit, medium-sized
description: Can be used to heal most wounds and gain some vitality.

name: Medkit, large
description: Can be used to heal even serious wounds and gain a lot of vitality.

name: Axe
description: Can be used to break fortifications and beats bare knuckles in a fight.
